name: Mace of Blood
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Specific Cursed Items/Mace of Blood

sections.body: This +3 heavy mace must be coated in blood every day, or else its bonus fades away until the mace is coated again. The character using this mace must make a DC 13 Will save every day it is within his possession or become chaotic evil.
